metrics.name: _Average AR creation to clearing time
metrics.description: Average time from Accounts Receivable creation to clearing

metrics.name: _Number of non-approved timesheets
metrics.description: Number of Timesheet Records that are not in status 'Approved'

metrics.name: _Number of approved timesheets
metrics.description: Number of timesheet records in status 'Approved'

metrics.name: _Number of Accounts Receivables documents
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivables documents that were created

metrics.name: _Number of Billing Requests (DMR)
metrics.description: Number of Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests)

metrics.name: _Billing request (DMR) rejection rate
metrics.description: Percentage of Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests) that were rejected

metrics.name: _Number of idle projects
metrics.description: Number of projects that are not closed and had no activity during a certain timeframe
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOW() - (SELECT LAST(end_time)) > DURATION '30days'
	  AND (SELECT FIRST(event_name) FILTER (
		WHERE event_name IN ('Clear Accounts Receivable'))) IS NULL
		  AND Project_StageText NOT IN ('Closed'))

metrics.name: _Total hours changed after approval
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that have been changed after approval

metrics.name: _Percentage of closed projects
metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Closed'

metrics.name: _Number of cancelled timesheets
metrics.description: Number of cancelled Timesheet Records

metrics.name: _Number of open Accounts Receivable documents (case-level)
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivable documents that are not yet cleared

metrics.name: _Total hours in process
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that are "in process"

metrics.name: _Number of open projects
metrics.description: Number of projects that are open, i.e. not in the stage 'Closed' or 'Completed'

metrics.name: _Average project start to end time
metrics.description: Average time from project start to project end date

metrics.name: _On-time payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared on or before the due date

metrics.name: _Total cleared amount
metrics.description: Total of all cleared amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: _Total hours released for approval
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in timesheets that were "released for approval"

metrics.name: _Number of invoices cancelled
metrics.description: Number of invoices (Billing Documents) that were cancelled

metrics.name: _Average payment delay
metrics.description: Average delay of payments in days

metrics.name: _Average project creation to end time
metrics.description: Average time from project creation to project end date

metrics.name: _Average project creation to start time
metrics.description: Average time from project creation to project start date

metrics.name: _Average net payment terms
metrics.description: Average of net payment terms in days

metrics.name: _Number of invoices created
metrics.description: Number of invoices (Billing Documents) that were created

metrics.name: _Late payment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices that were cleared one or more days after their due dates

metrics.name: _Percentage of projects in contract preparation
metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Contract Preparation'

metrics.name: _Average timesheet approval time
metrics.description: Average time from timesheet creation to timesheet approval

metrics.name: _Number of Accounts Receivables documents paid late
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivables documents that were paid late

metrics.name: _Average project planned to actual end time
metrics.description: Average time from planned project end to actual project end date

metrics.name: _Invoice cancellation rate
metrics.description: Percentage of invoices (Billing Documents) that were cancelled

metrics.name: _Number of  timesheets
metrics.description: Number of Timesheet Records

metrics.name: _Total cancelled hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in cancelled timesheets

metrics.name: _Number of cleared Accounts Receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of Accounts Receivable documents that were fully cleared

metrics.name: _Total rejected hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in rejected timesheets

metrics.name: _Total open amount
metrics.description: Total of all open amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: _Number of completed projects
metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'Completed'

metrics.name: _Number of rejected billing requests (DMR)
metrics.description: Number of rejected Billing Requests (Debit Memo Requests)

metrics.name: _Number of timesheets
metrics.description: Number of Timesheet Records

metrics.name: _Total approved hours
metrics.description: Total amount of hours in approved timesheets

metrics.name: _Number of closed projects
metrics.description: Number of projects in the stage 'Closed'

metrics.name: AGNOSTIC Total Number of Projects Created
_Percentage of projects with costs after end date
metrics.description: Percentage of projects with costs being posted after the official end date

metrics.name: _Percentage of projects in planning
metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'In Planning'

metrics.name: _Number of projects with costs after end date
metrics.description: Number of projects with costs being posted after the official end date

metrics.name: _Percentage of completed projects
metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'Completed'

metrics.name: _Number of projects with overdue Accounts Receivable documents
metrics.description: Number of projects that have at least one Accounts Receivable document that is overdue for longer than a certain timeframe
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE (SELECT COUNT(event_name) > 0
		   WHERE event_name = 'Create Accounts Receivable'
			 AND "ClearingDate" IS NULL
			 AND (NOW()-"NetDueDate") > DURATION '30days')
	)

metrics.name: _Number of projects created after start date
metrics.description: Number of projects that were created after the defined start date

metrics.name: _Total invoiced amount
metrics.description: Total of all invoiced amounts in Accounts Receivables

metrics.name: _Percentage of projects in execution
metrics.description: Percentage of projects in the stage 'In Execution'

metrics.name: _Percentage of projects created after start date
metrics.description: Percentage of projects that were created after the defined start date

metrics.name: Average cycle time
metrics.description: Average cycle time calculated from the first to the last event
